p: Arteriolar hyalinosis occurs by glomerular hyperfiltration [ 43], and this lesion is not exclusive to a specific disease, being observed in arterioles of normal individuals with advanced age [ 44]; however, it may occur earlier and more intensely in cases of hypertension and diabetes mellitus. However, this is the first study to describe this renal alteration in young adult fatal cases being caused by serotype 4.
